subject: Soccer
World Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Henry Kissinger, whose lesser-known résumé includes luring Pelé to the New York Cosmos in the 1970s, is now trying to bring the World Cup of soccer to the United States in 2018 or 2022.
snippet: Henry Kissinger, whose lesser-known résumé includes luring Pelé to the New York Cosmos in the 1970s, is now trying to bring the World Cup of soccer to the United States in 2018 or 2022.
